title: Beyond the Green Belt, another belt of 150 m
clause_text: Beyond the Green Belt, another belt of 150 m. should be created as "Low Density Zone" as shown on plan, attached with the report of the Authority.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Beyond the Green Belt, another belt of 150 m. should be created as "Low Density Zone" as shown on plan, attached with the report of the Authority.
